subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Bay and Brendan Ryan entered Friday with a mere 26 R.B.I. between them, but they drove in four in the fourth inning of the Mariners’ win over the Yankees.
snippet: Jason Bay and Brendan Ryan entered Friday with a mere 26 R.B.I. between them, but they drove in four in the fourth inning of the Mariners’ win over the Yankees.
